summary: Provides example scripts that train and evaluate the Simplified Graph Convolution (SGC) model on standard graph datasets (Cora, Citeseer, Pubmed, Reddit) using DGL and PyTorch, illustrating data loading, preprocessing, model construction, training loops, and performance reporting.
business_intent: Demonstrate the effectiveness and ease‑of‑use of the SGC algorithm for graph‑based node classification, serving as a reference implementation for researchers and developers to benchmark and integrate SGC into their own projects.
